==Bank 0==
<pre>
* 0x0000 to 0x003F = Blank Data
* 0x00C0 to 0x00FF = Blank Data
* 0x0134 to 0x0144 = The Name of the ROM
* 0x0144 to 0x0145 = New licensee (Always Nintendo)
* 0x0146 to 0x---- = says it has SGB Features
* 0x0147 to 0x---- = indicates Mapper MBC3+RAM+BATTERY
* 0x0148 to 0x---- = indicates 8MBit ROM Cart.
* 0x0149 to 0x---- = indicates 32k Save RAM size
* 0x014A to 0x---- = indicates Non to 0xJapan ROM
* 0x014B to 0x---- = indicates The Licensee.
* 0x014C to 0x---- = Header Check
* 0x014D to 0x014E = indicates The Global Checksum
* 0x014Dh to 0x--- = change the byte and the 2 after it to 0x200EE9
* 0x01AE to 0x0390 = Map Header Pointers
* 0x153B to 0x---- = Bank in which Pokémon Base Stats are stored
* 0x154F to 0x1550 = Kabutops skeleton Pic Pointers
* 0x1578 to 0x1579 = Pokémon stats pointer
* 0x1593 to 0x1594 = Mew's Stats Pointer
* 0x159C to 0x---- = Bank in which Mew's Base Stats are stored

Text
* 0x1A55 to 0x1A57 = TM
* 0x1A58 to 0x1A5F = TRAINER
* 0x1A60 to 0x1A62 = PC
* 0x1A63 to 0x1A69 = ROCKET
* 0x1A6A to 0x1A6E = POKé
* 0x1A6F to 0x1A71 = ……
* 0x1A72 to 0x1A78 = Enemy 
* 0x1A79 to 0x1A7B = PKMN

* 0x1E6E to 0x---- = Pointer to Pic pointer table?
* 0x2442 to 0x24D5 = Shop Items
* 0x2442 to 0x2448 = Viridian City Poké Mart
* 0x2449 to 0x2452 = Pewter City Poké Mart
* 0x2453 to 0x245C = Cerulean City Poké Mart
* 0x245D to 0x2460 = Cerulean City Bike Shop
* 0x2461 to 0x2469 = Vermilion City Poké Mart
* 0x246A to 0x2475 = Lavender Town Poké Mart

* 0x2476 to 0x24A7 = Celadon Department Store
  * 0x2476 to 0x2481 = Celadon Department Store 2F:  Trainer's Market  to Left cashier

  * 0x2496 to 0x249F = Celadon Department Store 5F:  Drugstore  to Left cashier
